nodes.text: Mahar Spince was a henchman of Nym's who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. In an attempt to reconcile their differences, and convince Nym to help the Alliance to Restore the Republic, Han Solo tasked a Rebel operative with finding and killing Spince, who had by then betrayed the Lok Revenants by helping the Blood Razors steal their munitions.
